review.title: “Initial awe of the scene draws you, but leaves you empty.”
review.pros: Pros – Lots of celebs pass through, plenty of perks for the nightlife scene.
review.cons: Cons – Understaffed. Lack of growth opportunity. Very highschool type scene when it comes to getting away with things and the culture of the hotel in general. Cliques.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend – I'm not optimistic about the outlook for this company
